page.title: Welcome Home
page.keywords: Regathering, Fall, Church this Fall, Welcome Home, Registration, Pre-register, Pre-registration
page.description: This page provides information on what The Meeting House is doing to re-launch in-person gatherings.

content.title: Welcome Home.
content.description: Home is more than a place. Itâ€™s an experience of being known, being connected with others and finding purpose and meaning as we serve and love each other.  We never stopped being the church during COVID but it sure felt different and even though it will still be different this fall we want to welcome everyone to experience a sense of home as we share life and learn about Jesus together.

image1.alt: Young woman in a face mask is sitting and smiling off camera as she talks to a friend.
Young man in a face mask is sitting and talking with friends.

content.text1: This webpage can be accessed via a unique url (themeetinghouse.com/training). Its purpose is to be a one stop shop for all training purposes within The Meeting House. It provides a consistent CTA for all staff and volunteers.
High level inspirational messaging about what's happening this Fall.

image1.alt: A woman is on her phone outside.

content.text1: All training for elders and hosts is found in our new elder hub.

content.text1: If you haven't found the information you're looking for, we want to hear from you. You're essential for running out church and we want to make sure you have everything you need.

list.title: Go to The Meeting House website

A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Subscribe to our email list and stay on top of the changing circumstances as we navigate this pandemic.
